solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isHappy(int n) {--newline--        Set<Integer> inLoop = new HashSet<Integer>();--newline--        int squareSum,remain;--newline--        while (inLoop.add(n)) {--newline--            squareSum = 0;--newline--            while (n > 0) {--newline--                remain = n%10;--newline--                squareSum += remain*remain;--newline--                n /= 10;--newline--            }--newline--            if (squareSum == 1)--newline--                return true;--newline--            else--newline--                n = squareSum;--newline--    --newline--        }--newline--        return false;--newline--    --newline--    }--newline--}
